entry.title: Apache CXF Aegis DataBinding 服务器端请求伪造漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Apache CXF Aegis DataBinding 服务器端请求伪造漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2024-28752

漏洞类型： 服务器端请求伪造

漏洞等级： 高危

漏洞描述： Apache CXF是一个开源服务框架，帮助用户使用前端编程API（如JAX-WS和JAX-RS）构建和开发服务。在Apache CXF 4.0.4、3.6.3和3.5.8之前的版本中，使用Aegis DataBinding存在一个SSRF漏洞，允许攻击者对至少接受一个任意类型参数的Web服务执行SSRF攻击。此漏洞特别影响使用Aegis DataBinding的服务，而使用其他数据绑定（包括默认绑定）的服务不受影响。攻击者可以利用此漏洞通过使服务器向任意URL发送请求来访问内部资源，可能导致信息泄露或对内部系统的进一步攻击。

产品厂商： Apache

产品名称： Apache CXF

影响版本： version < 4.0.4, version < 3.6.3, version < 3.5.8

来源： https://github.com/vulhub/vulhub/blob/a5090422bb9171d764237e8493d2f659adf372c7/apache-cxf%2FCVE-2024-28752%2FREADME.md

类型： vulhub/vulhub:github issues

来源概述

Apache CXF Aegis DataBinding Server-Side Request Forgery (CVE-2024-28752)

中文版本 (Chinese version)

Apache CXF is an open-source services framework that helps you build and develop services using frontend programming
APIs like JAX-WS and JAX-RS.

A SSRF vulnerability using the Aegis DataBinding in versions of Apache CXF before 4.0.4, 3.6.3 and 3.5.8 allows an
attacker to perform SSRF style attacks on webservices that take at least one parameter of any type. This vulnerability
specifically impacts services utilizing the Aegis DataBinding, while services using other data bindings, including the
default, are unaffected. Attackers can exploit this vulnerability to access internal resources by making the server send
requests to arbitrary URLs, potentially leading to information disclosure or further attacks against internal systems.

References:

  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-qmgx-j96g-4428
  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2024-28752
  • https://github.com/ReaJason/CVE-2024-28752

Environment Environment

Execute the following command to start a vulnerable Apache CXF webservice with Aegis DataBinding:

After the service starts, the vulnerable CXF webservice will be accessible at http://your-ip:8080/test?wsdl. The
service is configured to use Aegis DataBinding and accepts various parameter types, making it vulnerable to SSRF
attacks.

Vulnerability Reproduction

Send this request to the server:
entry.summary:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Apache CXF Aegis DataBinding 服务器端请求伪造漏洞

entry.title: Apache CXF Aegis DataBinding 服务端请求伪造漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Apache CXF Aegis DataBinding 服务端请求伪造漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2024-28752

漏洞类型： 服务端请求伪造

漏洞等级： 高危

漏洞描述： Apache CXF 在 4.0.4、3.6.3 和 3.5.8 版本之前存在一个使用 Aegis DataBinding 的 SSRF 漏洞，该漏洞允许攻击者对接受至少一个任意类型参数的 Web 服务执行 SSRF 攻击。此漏洞专门影响使用 Aegis DataBinding 的服务，而使用其他数据绑定 (包括默认数据绑定) 的服务不受影响。攻击者可以利用此漏洞通过让服务器向任意 URL 发送请求来访问内部资源，这可能导致信息泄露或对内部系统的进一步攻击。

产品厂商： Apache

产品名称： Apache CXF

影响版本： version < 4.0.4, version < 3.6.3, version < 3.5.8

来源： https://github.com/vulhub/vulhub/blob/a5090422bb9171d764237e8493d2f659adf372c7/apache-cxf%2FCVE-2024-28752%2FREADME.zh-cn.md

类型： vulhub/vulhub:github issues

来源概述

Apache CXF Aegis DataBinding 服务端请求伪造漏洞 (CVE-2024-28752)

Apache CXF 是一个开源的服务框架，帮助开发者使用 JAX-WS 和 JAX-RS 等前端编程 API 构建和开发服务。

Apache CXF 在 4.0.4、3.6.3 和 3.5.8 版本之前存在一个使用 Aegis
DataBinding 的 SSRF 漏洞，该漏洞允许攻击者对接受至少一个任意类型参数的 Web 服务执行 SSRF 攻击。此漏洞专门影响使用 Aegis
DataBinding 的服务，而使用其他数据绑定 (包括默认数据绑定) 的服务不受影响。攻击者可以利用此漏洞通过让服务器向任意 URL
发送请求来访问内部资源，这可能导致信息泄露或对内部系统的进一步攻击。

参考链接：

  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-qmgx-j96g-4428
  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2024-28752
  • https://github.com/ReaJason/CVE-2024-28752

环境搭建

执行如下命令启动一个存在漏洞的 Apache CXF Web 服务，该服务使用 Aegis DataBinding：

服务启动后，存在漏洞的 CXF Web 服务将可以通过 http://your-ip:8080/test?wsdl 访问。该服务配置为使用 Aegis
DataBinding 并接受各种参数类型，使其容易受到 SSRF 攻击。

漏洞复现

发送如下请求即可触发 SSRF 读取 /etc/hosts 文件内容：
entry.summary:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Apache CXF Aegis DataBinding 服务端请求伪造漏洞<

entry.title: Fastjson 反序列化漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Fastjson 反序列化漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2017-18349

漏洞类型： 反序列化

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： Fastjson在1.2.25之前的版本中存在远程代码执行漏洞，该漏洞源于parseObject中的不安全反序列化。远程攻击者可以通过发送恶意的JSON数据到/json端点来执行任意代码。

产品厂商： Fastjson

产品名称： Fastjson

影响版本： version < 1.2.25

来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/issues/12387

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

来源概述

Description:

Fastjson before 1.2.25 contains a remote code execution caused by unsafe deserialization in parseObject, letting remote attackers execute arbitrary code via crafted JSON data, exploit requires sending malicious JSON payload to /json endpoint.

Severity: Critical
POC:
  • https://github.com/pippo-java/pippo/issues/466
  • https://github.com/h0cksr/Fastjson--CVE-2017-18349-

KEV: True

Shodan Query: NA

Acceptance Criteria: The template must include a complete POC and should not rely solely on version-based detection. Contributors are required to provide debug data(-debug) along with the template to help the triage team with validation or can also share a vulnerable environment like docker file.

Rewards will only be given once the template is fully validated by the team. Templates that are incomplete or invalid will not be accepted. Avoid adding code templates for CVEs that can be achieved using HTTP, TCP, or JavaScript. Such templates are blocked by default and won’t produce results, so we prioritize creating templates with other protocols unless exceptions are made.

You can check the FAQ for the Nuclei Templates Community Rewards Program here.
entry.summary:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Fastjson 反序列化漏洞

漏洞编号：

entry.title: FlexPaper Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： FlexPaper Remote Code Execution Vulnerability

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2018-11686

漏洞类型： 命令执行

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： FlexPaper (FlowPaper) 2.3.6版本中的setup.php和change_config.php文件存在不安全处理，导致远程攻击者可以执行任意代码。利用此漏洞需要能够访问这些脚本。

产品厂商： FlexPaper

产品名称： FlexPaper (FlowPaper)

影响版本： 2.3.6

来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/issues/12369

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

来源概述

Description:

FlexPaper (FlowPaper) 2.3.6 contains a remote code execution caused by insecure handling in setup.php and change_config.php, letting remote attackers execute arbitrary code, exploit requires access to these scripts.

Severity: Critical
POC:
  • https://redtimmysec.wordpress.com/2019/03/07/flexpaper-remote-code-execution
  • https://vulncheck.com/xdb/b67f601a7711
  • https://github.com/mpgn/CVE-2018-11686
  • https///github.com:mpgn/CVE-2018-11686.git

KEV: True

Shodan Query: NA

Acceptance Criteria: The template must include a complete POC and should not rely solely on version-based detection. Contributors are required to provide debug data(-debug) along with the template to help the triage team with validation or can also share a vulnerable environment like docker file.

Rewards will only be given once the template is fully validated by the team. Templates that are incomplete or invalid will not be accepted. Avoid adding code templates for CVEs that can be achieved using HTTP, TCP, or JavaScript. Such templates are blocked by default and won’t produce results, so we prioritize creating templates with other protocols unless exceptions are made.

You can check the FAQ for the Nuclei Templates Community Rewards Program here.
entry.summary:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： FlexPaper Remote Code Execution Vulnera

entry.title: Microsoft .NET Framework Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Microsoft .NET Framework Remote Code Execution Vulnerability

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2020-0646

漏洞类型： 命令执行

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： Microsoft .NET Framework 存在一个由于输入验证不当导致的远程代码执行漏洞，允许远程攻击者通过向系统发送恶意输入来执行任意代码。

产品厂商： Microsoft

产品名称： .NET Framework

搜索语法： server: ms .net remoting

来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/issues/12210

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

来源概述

Description:

Microsoft .NET Framework contains a remote code execution caused by improper input validation, letting remote attackers execute arbitrary code, exploit requires sending malicious input to the system.

Severity: Critical
POC:
  • http://packetstormsecurity.com/files/156930/SharePoint-Workflows-XOML-Injection.html

KEV: True

Shodan Query: server: ms .net remoting

Acceptance Criteria: The template must include a complete POC and should not rely solely on version-based detection. Contributors are required to provide debug data(-debug) along with the template to help the triage team with validation or can also share a vulnerable environment like docker file.

Rewards will only be given once the template is fully validated by the team. Templates that are incomplete or invalid will not be accepted. Avoid adding code templates for CVEs that can be achieved using HTTP, TCP, or JavaScript. Such templates are blocked by default and won’t produce results, so we prioritize creating templates with other protocols unless exceptions are made.

You can check the FAQ for the Nuclei Templates Community Rewards Program here.
